channel.title: Omg please help me with death!
channel.description:
help me!!! when i die i end up in a pkbox ive made how to change that? and when you die u dont loose items and u get 0 hp so u cant move or anything. i have to go into character folder and type 1 hp or highter to get them playe how do i add so u get 1 hp left or full if u die and u loose every item except the most valuables.
and how do i add it (like i got admin pl8) how to add that u cant loose it or it will be destroyed when u die as admin in pk or being killed of a moinaster
please help me :D i give rep i think if i can :)

item.title: Omg please help me with death!
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

umm a good wait to start this out is for the ending in pkbox is when you die type ::mypos this will give you the coordinates then search in client.java for the first coord like say it says X:3222 Y:3218 search for 3222 if it isnt in client.java check player.java it is known to be there. For the deleting items it should be in your dieing method just add a deleteItem(4445. 1) and if you want to add sM(your plate hase been destroyed)

Read full topic
